about.title: About Me
about.intro1: Hello! I'm a passionate Full-Stack Developer focused on modern web technologies. With several years of experience in software development, I have successfully implemented numerous projects.
about.intro2: My strength lies in developing scalable, performant and user-friendly applications. I am constantly looking for new challenges and opportunities to expand my skills.
about.intro3: Besides programming, I'm interested in UI/UX Design, Cloud Computing and agile development methods. I believe in clean code, continuous learning and the power of collaboration.
